mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mentor_review (rating, mentee_id, mentor_id, feedback) VALUES (#{rating}, #{menteeId}, #{mentorId}, #{feedback})
mapper.select: SELECT #{mentorId} as mentor_id, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(rating), 1), 0) as averageScore, COUNT(*) as reviewCount, COALESCE(SUM(rating), 0) as totalScore, COALESCE(ROUND(AVG(rating), 1), 0) as displayScore FROM mentor_review WHERE mentor_id = #{mentorId}

SELECT m.mentor_id, m.introduction, m.experience_years as experienceYears, m.specialties as specialties, COALESCE(m.score, 0) as averageRating, mem.name FROM mentor m JOIN member mem ON m.user_id = mem.user_id WHERE m.mentor_id = #{mentorId}
